Description: Stamp (vessel): quarter-qisṭ. Measure of olive-oil. Six line Kufic inscription. Made of green glass.
Curator's comments: The half-qisṭ denomination for olive oil in the series of Yazīd and Ḥayyān is represented by a piece in the Museo Sacro of the Vatican (Fremersdorf 1975, 892). Bibliography: Fremersdorf, Fritz. 1975. Antikes, islamisches und mittelalterliches Glas : sowie kleinere Arbeiten aus Stein, Gagat und verwandten Stoffen in den vatikanschen Sammlungen roms (Museo Sacro, Museo Profano, Museo Egizio, Antiquarium Romanum). ‘Catalogo del Museo Sacro della Biblioteca Apostolica Vaticana Biblioteca Apostolica Vaticana’ V. Vatican City.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (27)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Abu Khalid Yazid II ibn 'Abd al-Malik
Named in inscription: Ḥayyān b. Shurayḥ
